由於三號強風信號現正生效，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須:
i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施；
ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況；
iii.提早計劃行程路線；
iv.預留充裕時間出門；
v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及
vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) runs additional sleeper trains trips and cancellation of selected sleeper train trip
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)加開臨時臥鋪列車服務及部分臥鋪列車車次取消

2025-09-19T19:52:00.CONTENT_EN: In response to the demand, High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) will add the following temporary sleeper train trips: Between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Beijingxi Station: 30 Sep, 1, 2, 7, 8 Oct: G897, G898 Between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Shanghai Hongqiao Station: 30 Sep, 1, 7, 8 Oct: G899, G900 In addition, as informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, the following sleeper train trips have been cancelled due to scheduling arrangements: Between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Beijingxi Station: 28 Sep, 3, 4 Oct: G897, G898 Please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process your ticket refund within the time stated. Tickets are available for purchase through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app; appointed travel agents; or at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app, or the High Speed Rail website or mobile app.
2025-09-19T19:52:00.CONTENT_CN: 配合客運需求，高速鐵路(香港段)將加開以下臨時臥鋪列車車次： 來往香港西九龍站及北京西站： 9月30日，10月1、2、7、8日：G897,G898 來往香港西九龍站及上海虹橋站： 9月30日，10月1、7、8日：G899,G900 另外，因列車調度安排，以下臥鋪列車車次取消： 來往香港西九龍站及北京西站： 9月28日，10月3、4日：G897,G898 你可參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理退票。 你可透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、指定代理或前往香港西九龍站購買列車車票。 有關列車服務詳情，請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。

2025-09-19T23:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-09-19T23:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-09-20T01:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-09-20T01:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR Train Service Arrangement (Quarry Bay Station)
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港鐵服務安排(鰂魚涌站)

2025-09-20T05:57:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that according to the latest assessment, train service for Tseung Kwan O Line and Island Line remain normal today (20 Sep). The train frequency of Island Line will be enhanced during the morning peak hours. 
Entrances/Exits A and B of Quarry Bay Station are temporarily closed because of police action near the station. Please use Entrance/ Exit C.
2025-09-20T05:57:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，根據最新評估，將軍澳綫及港島綫今天(9月20日)維持正常服務。港島綫列車服務會於早上繁忙時間加強。
為配合警方於站外的行動，鰂魚涌站A及B出入口暫時關閉，請使用C出入口。
